casebody.data:
UNITED STATES ex rel. Chaya FINFER, Relator-Appellant, v. Henry A. CURRAN, as Commissioner, etc., Respondent-Appellee. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. March 18, 1924.) No. 323. Siegel & Com, of New York City, for appellant. J. C. Thomas, of New York City, for appellee.

Before ROGERS, HOUGH, and MAYER, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order affirmed in open court.
